description: This file contains functions that generate C++ code for JSON-RPC communication, including emitting event handlers, registering/unregistering RPC methods, and namespace/version management. It appears to be part of a code generation tool for a plugin framework.

classes.name: AppendTest
classes.description: A class imported from 'class_emitter' used in code generation for testing property parameters

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates C++ code for emitting an event handler function based on event data

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Emits the prologue code for the RPC interface, including headers, namespace declarations, and versioning

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Emits the epilogue code, closing namespaces for the RPC interface

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Generates version namespace with major, minor, and patch version numbers

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates the full RPC registration code including methods, properties, and events

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main entry point that generates RPC code, wrapping the prologue and epilogue

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates the version info code within the RPC interface

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
